game.name: 3D Gravity Rocket
game.shortDescription: Is a game about a mechanical robot that could fly thanks to having a propeller on its head. In the game you need to collect a certain number of nuts to win the level.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Is a game about a mechanical robot that could fly thanks to having a propeller on its head. In the game you need to collect a certain number of nuts to win the level.

reviewHighlights.text: Dogshit controls. Absolutely miserable. The things shown in the video are not possible like that because the game runs way too quick for anything like...
